import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import pencillImg from "../images/pencill.svg"; function Main({ onEditAvatar, onEditProfile, onAddPlace, userName, userDescription, userAvatar, cards, }) { return (

{userName}

{userDescription}

{cards.map((card) => (

{card.name}

{card.likes}

))}
); } export default Main;
